mapper.sql: product_id , product_code, product_name, capacity, brand, current_stock, new_stock
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.capacity, p.brand, p.current_stock, p.new_stock, p.image_url FROM products p LEFT JOIN yeumeent_czmn.brands b ON p.brand = b.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(p.product_code) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND UPPER(p.product_name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND UPPER(b.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (product_name, capacity, brand, current_stock, new_stock) VALUES (#{name}, #{capacity}, #{brand}, #{currentStock}, #{newStock})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_code = #{code}, product_name = #{name}, capacity = #{capacity}, brand = #{brand}, current_stock = #{currentStock}, new_stock = #{newStock} WHERE product_id = #{id}
